articles.description: Champions League reaction and build-up after dramatic wins for PSG and Borussia Dortmund, while Manchester City and Arsenal prepare for Wednesday matches.
articles.title: Reaction to Champions League drama after PSG & Dortmund reach semi-finals

articles.description: After Paris St-Germain come back to reach the Champions League semi-finals, is it time for Kylian Mbappe to deliver a European trophy?
articles.title: 'This is your time' - Mbappe keeps PSG 'dream' alive

articles.description: Borussia Dortmund reach their first Champions League semi-final in 11 years by producing a superb second-half comeback to beat Atletico Madrid 5-4 on aggregate.
articles.title: Dortmund edge Atletico in thriller to reach semis

articles.description: LeBron James scores 23 points as the Los Angeles Lakers beat the New Orleans Pelicans to book their place in the NBA play-offs.
articles.title: NBA: LeBron James helps Los Angeles Lakers beat New Orleans Pelicans to reach play-offs
How City of Light changed the Olympics

articles.description: A win for Nelly Korda at this week's Chevron Championship would be a significant boost for the women's game, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Chevron Championship: Nelly Korda chasing fifth LPGA Tour win in row at first women's major of 2024

articles.description: Barcelona had a two-goal aggregate lead and were seemingly in control in Spain until it all turned to chaos against Paris St-Germain.
articles.title: 'Panic' costs Barca as Xavi unhappy with referee

articles.description: Manchester City and Real Madrid's Champions League quarter-final second leg will be another England audition for two of the nation's greatest talents.
articles.title: Foden v Bellingham - the battle for England's number 10 shirt

articles.description: The majority of elite female athletes in a new study support the categorisation of women's sport by biological sex, rather than gender identity.
articles.title: 'Fairness must take priority' in trans debate - new study

articles.description: Jos Buttler hits 107 not out to lead Rajasthan Royals to a thrilling Indian Premier League victory off the final ball in pursuit of 224 against Kolkata Knight Riders.
articles.title: Buttler's 107 leads Rajasthan to final-ball win
